statements: SELECT * FROM financial_processes;
SELECT process_id, process_name FROM financial_processes WHERE date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT process_name, amount FROM financial_processes WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT AVG(amount) AS average_amount FROM financial_processes WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_processes FROM financial_processes WHERE status = 'completed';
SELECT * FROM financial_processes WHERE process_id = 12345;
SELECT SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM financial_processes WHERE process_status = 'completed';
SELECT process_id, customer_name, payment_method FROM financial_processes WHERE payment_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT AVG(amount) AS average_amount, COUNT(process_id) as total_processes FROM financial_processes WHERE process_status IN ('completed', 'pending');
SELECT * FROM financial_processes ORDER BY process_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_type, amount FROM financial_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT account_name, balance FROM financial_accounts ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'Deposit' AND amount > 500;
SELECT account_name, balance, account_type FROM financial_accounts WHERE balance < 0 ORDER BY balance ASC;
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'Deposit';
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM financial_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT account_name, balance FROM financial_accounts WHERE balance < 0 ORDER BY account_name ASC;
SELECT account_id, account_type FROM financial_accounts WHERE account_type = 'Savings' AND balance > 5000;
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_type FROM financial_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com%';
SELECT * FROM financial_system_integration ORDER BY last_sync_date;
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT transaction_type, amount, transaction_date FROM financial_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'Credit' AND amount < 500 ORDER BY amount ASC
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com%' AND phone_number <> '+1234567890'
SELECT * FROM financial_system_integration WHERE integration_type = 'API' ORDER BY last_sync_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT integration_id, integration_name FROM financial_system_integration
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT transaction_date, amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT account_name, balance FROM accounts WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY account_name ASC;
SELECT software_name, integration_type FROM financial_software;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT account_name, balance FROM accounts WHERE balance < 0.00
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%John%'
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30'
SELECT * FROM financial_software WHERE integration_type = 'API' ORDER BY software_name ASC
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, amount FROM financial_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT category, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM financial_transactions GROUP BY category ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM invoices WHERE customer_id = 101 ORDER BY invoice_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products WHERE price < 50;
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC, amount ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone='123456789';
SELECT invoice_id, amount, payment_status FROM invoices WHERE payment_status='Pending' ORDER BY invoice_date;
SELECT account_name, account_type, balance FROM accounts WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 5;
